title: User Registration Success
description: Verify the user can successfully register with valid credentials and receive correct user object in response.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid username and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the API returns a successful user creation response with user object.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard or login page.

title: User Registration Failure - Duplicate Username
description: Verify the system returns appropriate error when trying to register with an already existing username.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input username already registered and any password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the API returns error indicating username duplication.
Verify UI shows user-friendly error notification.

title: User Login Success
description: Ensure user can login with correct credentials and receive JWT token with session persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify API returns JWT token, user object, and expiration details.
Verify authenticated session is persisted and user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure - Incorrect Credentials
description: Validate that login fails with incorrect username or password and error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify API returns unauthorized error.
Verify UI displays appropriate error toast notification.

title: JWT Token Expiration and Session Renewal
description: Test that expired JWT tokens are handled properly and session renewal or logout is enforced.

steps.description: Authenticate user and obtain JWT token.
Simulate token expiration.
Make an authenticated API call.
Verify API rejects token and triggers logout or token refresh flow.
Verify user is notified and redirected appropriately.

title: Logout Functionality
description: Verify user can successfully logout and session is cleared.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials.
Click logout button.
Verify API invalidates session.
Verify user session data and JWT token are cleared.
Verify user is redirected to login page.

title: Video Browsing Load Performance
description: Verify video browsing UI loads video series list and episodes within 3 seconds with responsive grid layout.

steps.description: Login and navigate to video browsing page.
Measure time to load video series grid is less than 3 seconds.
Select a series.
Verify episodes of selected series load promptly with responsive UI.

title: Responsive Design on Multiple Devices
description: Verify video grid layout and navigation is responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the video browsing UI on desktop screen size.
UI elements are aligned properly and grid is displayed.
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions.
Verify grid adjusts seamlessly with smooth animations.
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions.
Verify UI remains usable and all interactive elements are accessible.

title: Video Player Playback and Subtitle Display
description: Verify video player loads, plays video correctly with playback controls and subtitle display with vocabulary highlighting.

steps.description: Select a video episode and load the video player.
Verify video loads and playback controls are interactive.
Play the video and observe subtitle display.
Verify subtitles appear synchronized with video.
Verify unknown vocabulary words are highlighted in subtitles.

title: Video Player 5-Minute Segment Navigation
description: Check that user can navigate video by 5-minute segments using custom controls.

steps.description: Load a video in the player.
Use the 5-minute segment navigation controls to skip forward.
Verify video playback jumps exactly 5 minutes ahead.
Use the 5-minute segment controls to skip backward.
Verify video playback jumps exactly 5 minutes behind.

title: Asynchronous Video Processing Pipeline Completion
description: Ensure asynchronous pipeline completes transcription, filtering, and translation with valid progress updates.

steps.description: Trigger video processing pipeline for a new video.
Verify system returns task_id and initial status.
Poll task progress endpoint until status is completed.
Verify progress values increase logically and current_step changes through transcription, filtering, translation.
Verify final status is completed with no errors.

title: Video Processing Error Handling and Retry
description: Simulate failure in video processing pipeline step and verify error notification and retry mechanism.

steps.description: Start video processing task with simulated failure injected.
Monitor task progress endpoint.
Verify status changes to error with appropriate error message.
Verify UI displays error toast notification with retry option.
Trigger retry action.
Verify pipeline resumes and eventually completes successfully.

title: Vocabulary Swiping Game Word Marking
description: Validate the interactive vocabulary game correctly marks words as known or unknown and updates user stats.

steps.description: Start the vocabulary swiping game with a set of words.
Swipe some words as known and others as unknown.
Verify each word's status is updated in backend via API call.
Verify user's vocabulary statistics reflect the changes accurately.

title: Vocabulary Library CEFR Level Filtering
description: Ensure vocabulary library filters and displays words by CEFR difficulty levels correctly with counts.

steps.description: Open vocabulary library.
Select a CEFR level filter.
Verify words shown belong only to the selected CEFR level.
Verify total count and known word count are displayed accurately.

title: Bulk Mark Words Known/Unknown
description: Validate bulk marking of words in a CEFR level as known or unknown updates all correctly with API confirmation.

steps.description: In vocabulary library, select a CEFR level.
Trigger bulk mark known button.
Verify API call completes with success.
Verify all words in level are marked known and stats updated.
Trigger bulk mark unknown operation.
Verify all words are marked unknown and stats updated.

title: User Profile Fetch and Update
description: Verify fetching and updating user profile and settings with valid data through API calls and UI.

steps.description: Navigate to profile screen.
Verify API returns user profile data.
Modify profile fields such as name, preferences.
Submit updates.
Verify API successfully updates and returns updated profile.
Verify updated info is reflected on UI.

title: Dark/Light Theme Switching
description: Verify user can toggle between dark and light themes and UI updates accordingly with context and styled components.

steps.description: Locate theme toggle control in UI.
Switch to dark theme.
Verify UI colors and styles update to dark mode.
Switch back to light theme.
Verify UI colors and styles update to light mode.

title: Real-time Processing Progress Visualization
description: Verify that the progress of asynchronous video processing tasks is displayed in real-time with correct status and progress percentage.

steps.description: Trigger video processing task.
Navigate to processing progress screen.
Verify UI displays current task status including 'processing', 'completed', or 'error'.
Verify progress bar or percentage updates over time accurately.
Verify current step name and messages are displayed.

title: API Logging for Error and Operational Events
description: Validate that error and operational events are correctly logged in backend without loss of critical information.

steps.description: Perform an action that triggers an API error.
Verify backend logs capture error event with relevant metadata.
Perform normal API calls.
Verify backend logs operational events with no data loss.

title: Comprehensive Error Notification and Recovery
description: Ensure all error states trigger toast notifications and that user can recover gracefully without losing data.

steps.description: Simulate failed API response.
Verify toast notification with error message is shown.
Attempt recovery action such as retry or back navigation.
Verify UI state recovers without data loss or crashes.

title: API Response Time Under Concurrent Usage
description: Under simulated concurrent user load, verify API key endpoints respond within performance benchmarks.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent API calls to endpoints like /api/videos, /api/auth/me, /api/vocabulary/stats.
Verify all API responses are returned within target response times.
Verify no timeout or error responses due to concurrency.

title: Video Chunk Processing with Boundary Times
description: Test video chunk processing endpoint with valid, boundary, and invalid start and end times.

steps.description: Invoke /api/videos/process-chunk with start and end times within video duration.
Verify chunk processes successfully.
Invoke endpoint with start_time equal to end_time.
Verify API rejects request with appropriate error.
Invoke endpoint with end_time greater than video length.
Verify API returns error or clamps to valid range.

title: Vocabulary Preload API Valid Response
description: Verify the vocabulary preload API returns success, message, and level counts correctly.

steps.description: Call /api/vocabulary/preload endpoint.
Verify response contains success: true, a message string, and a levels object with counts.

title: Subtitle Filtering Based on User Vocabulary
description: Check the filter-subtitles API filters subtitles according to user's known vocabulary and returns filtered results.

steps.description: Call /api/videos/filter-subtitles with video_path and user's vocabulary data.
Verify the subtitles returned only contain unknown or relevant words.

title: Translation API Functionality and Reliability
description: Ensure subtitles are correctly translated from German to English and handle invalid inputs gracefully.

steps.description: Call /api/videos/translate with valid source and target languages and video_path.
Verify translated subtitles are returned and correctly mapped.
Call translate API with unsupported language code.
Verify API returns meaningful error message.

title: Profile Settings Fetch and Update
description: Validate fetching and updating user settings via profile settings endpoints with valid data and UI reflection.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings page.
Verify GET /api/profile/settings returns current user settings.
Modify settings (e.g., learning preferences, theme).
Submit updated settings.
Verify PUT /api/profile/settings returns success and settings are updated in UI.

title: Search Functionality in Video Browsing
description: Ensure the search box filters video series and episodes appropriately and updates UI dynamically.

steps.description: Enter search term in video browsing search input.
Verify series and episodes list updates to show matching results.
Enter a search term with no matching results.
Verify UI shows 'no results found' message.

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify UI components including forms, buttons, and video player meet common accessibility standards (aria attributes, keyboard navigation).

steps.description: Navigate through login, registration, video browsing, and vocabulary screens using keyboard only.
Verify focus indicators are visible and tab order is logical.
Verify aria-labels and roles are present and correct on interactive elements.
